How to install "Rebtel Client"?

The application should be available soon on the android market. But in the meantime, follow these steps:

First of all, download the last version of Rebtel Client from [http://code.google.com/p/rebtelt-client/ Home page]

Installation steps:

=Method 1=

(If you have the SDK and drivers installed)

*
 # Plug your android device on the USB
 # Type the following command in shell: "adb install RebtelClient.apk"

=Method 2=
If you don't have The SDK and drivers installed.

*
 # Download "Apps Installer"
 # Put the .apk on your SDcard
 # Run "Apps Installer" and look for "RebtelClient"
